BRANCH.COMMENT: Verify using token (if provided) if session not established

SEQUENCE.NAME: %userID% == $null && %accessToken% != $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: check if we have access token

SEQUENCE.NAME: true
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Our issued key, extract user id from claims

SEQUENCE.NAME: %numDays% != $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: if numDays is present then we need to check to see if we have a copy of the token locally, if not asume it has been revoked

BRANCH.COMMENT: do we have a record of the token ?

Values.value: Authorization failed due to invalid token
